name: Chat Inc
description:
Slide into their inbox with the most intuitive WhatsApp Marketing and Lead Acquisition Platform for Digital Marketing Professionals looking for predictable spend and results. Go beyond single digit conversion and ROI, with impressive adoption, low opt-out rates, and conversion metrics that will make you lean in. 

Flex is super simple to get going, and comes with “dare we say” one of the most intuitive interfaces that helps thousands of our customers to effortlessly:

- Run personalised (DTC) WhatsApp Marketing and Broadcast Campaigns at scale.
- Collect and understand customer preferences and behaviours via WhatsApp.
- Capture opt-ins and acquire qualified leads in-store or online using WhatsApp.
- Increase basket size, purchase frequency or retention with WhatsApp.
- Drive customer sales online, in-store or on socials.
- Run Loyalty and Reward Programs via WhatsApp.

Chat Inc - Great service, easy-to-use platform, competitive pricing, and a team dedicated to your ongoing success.
focus_areas: WhatsApp Marketing, WhatsApp Promotional Messaging, WhatsApp Lead Acquisition, Business Messaging, Messaging Commerce, WhatsApp-Shopify.
Full featured and affordable agent inbox for WhatsApp and Instagram for small to medium sized teams.
“Done for you” WhatsApp Campaign Execution Service, WhatsApp Warm Up Campaigns, Enterprise and Bespoke Chatbot Development.
